title: Krispy Kreme can't beat CompUSA
content:
You can almost smell the aroma of fresh plastic hot off the assembly line!
Source: First look: Xbox 360 accessory packaging - Joystiq - www.joystiq.com

Am I the only one who, immediately after opening the box of any electronic gadget, gives it a nice and thorough sniffing? Ahh, fresh plastic and electronical stuff. It's better than donuts.

Oh wait, I'm not the only oneâ€”there's at least one other, and I'm marrying her.

Archived Comments

  • Aristotle Pagaltzis
    2005-10-11T17:17:35

    I don't know about plastic or electronics---but I love the smell of books and magazines.
